summary: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.
cast: Peter Sallis|Ralph Fiennes|Helena Bonham Carter|Peter Kay|Nicholas Smith|Liz Smith|John Thomson|Mark Gatiss|Vincent Ebrahim|Geraldine McEwan|Edward Kelsey|Dicken Ashworth|Robert Horvath|Pete Atkin|Noni Lewis|Ben Whitehead|Christopher Fairbank|James Mather|William Vanderpuye|Tony Jay|Nigel Pilkington
title: Wallace & Gromit: La maldición de las verduras
